title: DC'd and unable to reconnect
body: I was in a beginning of a ranked match against pantheon and I had an issue to reconnect so I left the game to see what the issue was, but everything was normal on my end and I reopened my client to reconnect, but it's like I was never in a game and didn't show a reconnect button.

replies.body: since today i have to run in windows 8 compatibility mode and it works from after that.

It sounds like it might have resulted in a remake.  :(  If you're still having this issue, I highly recommend going over each step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide, as some network instability may be causing you to disconnect.  Let me know if you have any questions!
